+#![crate_type="lib"]
+
+// @has lib/struct.Struct.html //pre '#[must_use]'
+#[must_use]
+pub struct Struct {
+    field: i32,
+}
+
+// @has lib/enum.Enum.html //pre '#[must_use = "message"]'
+#[must_use = "message"]
+pub enum Enum {
+    Variant(i32),
+}
